              more sparetime killed.. enjoy! / ONY

ABOUT:

FlashFXP Password Recovery is a utility that will recover FTP passwords for all accounts
set-up with FlashFXP. This tool works by decrypting the FTP password information from
the registry and showing it in a simple way. Proxy password information is also shown
if FlashFXP is set-up to connect to remote FTP servers through the proxy. All versions
of FlashFXP FTP are supported. Recovery from external data files (Sites.dat) is also
possible.

Functionality of FlashFXP password recovery - in other words, what this tool can do:

    * All versions of FlashFXP are supported
    * Decrypt FlashFXP FTP password (FlashFXP password decrypter)
    * Decode FlashFXP passwords (FlashFXP password decoder)
    * Crack FlashFXP account passwords (FlashFXP password cracker)
    * Recover FlashFXP password (FlashFXP password recovery)
    * Find FlashFXP passwords (FlashFXP password finder)
    * FlashFXP password ripper (rip FlashFXP passwords)
    * FlashFXP remote account hacker (not implemented)

Extra recovery features:

    * Support for multiple FTP accounts
    * Socks proxy password recovered
    * FTP proxy password decrypted
    * Recovery from external data file (Sites.dat) is supported
    * Drap-n-drop of account files supported
